name: bunkerm
description: BunkerM is a self-hosted dashboard for managing and monitoring Docker containers or apps. It features resource stats, controls for containers, and a clean web UI designed for local servers or NAS setups.
features: Docker Management: Monitor and control Docker containers easily. Visual container control.
Resource Stats: Track CPU, memory, and network usage. Performance insights.
Container Controls: Start, stop, and restart containers from web UI. Simple management.
Clean Interface: User-friendly dashboard for server management. Intuitive design.
NAS Optimized: Perfect for home servers and NAS setups. Home lab ready.
Self-Hosted: Run your own container management dashboard. Complete control.
